column3: ‚ÄúI am a 60 year old male who has had two back surgeries and have a myopathy called Pompe disease. I am about at the end of my time here on earth as this disease progresses and the best medicine I have found to relieve the pain has come from this plant. I was on the normal" protocol of opiates from my doctor for years and then I tried this strain. Daily usage has allowed me to greatly reduce the dosage of the Morphine...‚Äù"

‚ÄúMe and my friend hit this out of a bong one night in a hurry, some asshole played a joke on us and said the cops came right as we hit a giant nugget; what occurred next was legendary to us. We sat in my car, in a parking lot for 4 hours straight unable to move, and staring at the stars, after that time we drove (with great difficulty) to a restruant where we stared at our food for 2 hours before we came down. We have...‚Äù

‚ÄúHands down best weed I've smoked. This tree really releases all of your blocks. On your mind and your body. Your thoughts just flow to you effortlessly. And the relief of my back pain almost made tears of joy come up. I couldn't feel any pain whatsoever(chronic back pain from injury). Doesn't feel like an indica at all. I'm a sativa guy. I need more of this in my life.‚Äù

‚Äú...I am laughing on the inside and outside, because I see why people say this is the ultimate in Marijuana. (and everything is honestly funny to me right now)

I. AM. IN. LOVE. 

I have been smoking for awhile now, and all pretty great strains that are well known and universally enjoyed, but I have NEVER had a strain this complex in terms of effects. 

This feels like what the stereotype of hippy/jamaican/rasta ganja...‚Äù

‚ÄúI have 40+ years experience growing and using cannabis, a masters degree in agri/horticulture from MSU and will break each review down as follows from my own personal experience with seeds or clones obtained directly from the original breeders. There are many breeders selling this version of this awesome creation and although they have their differences, they are all good in their own way and are very similar unlike ...‚Äù

‚ÄúDid exactly what the description says. It's an indica people, definitely NOT for daytime use (unless you want to sleep during the day). Wasn't sure it was going to live up to the hype, but me likey. Whoever grew this crop did it right. Your troubles and any pain will melt away. You won't melt into the couch, but I didn't want to leave, lol. Be one with the Northern Lights... You are the Northern Lights. Let it slowly...‚Äù

‚ÄúFinally got to try this well-renowned strain, beautifully extracted into shatter. Upon first dab, I was feeling great! For the first ~20 minutes, was relaxing, calming, slowly vaporizing me just as the banger did the shatter. I didn't realize it, I thought my insomnia was going to continue, my poor day the same, and late-night anxiety on red alert. WRONG! This strain gently laid me into a deep sense of relaxation, my...‚Äù

‚ÄúNothern Lights hits you up really strong. Felt as if time stopped and my head took the first flight to planet euforia! Great taste, sweet but pine. Fiji Water tasted delicious hahaha. 5/5 would buy again.‚Äù

‚ÄúGood night!!!üò¥üò¥üò¥ I had so much energy until I smoked this. Awesome strain. Its not loud or pungent in flavor nor aroma. Pretty light until you take a puff. Like most indicas this was a slow groove high that kinda crept up on you.‚Äù

‚ÄúI got a batch of Northern Lights wax from Native Roots and thought it really deserved a review. 

The taste was that of sweet smooth earth. If that makes sense, its super nice actually not overwhelming but just right.  As for effects the vibrating body buzz from this stuff was real.  Multiple nights it knocked me out with the lights on.  Very power stuff, enjoyable as hell but potent!  That said, if you're looking fo...‚Äù

‚ÄúI just smoked a joint of Northern Lights this morning and I am indeed high as fuck. So, with that out of the way I'll try and leave a somewhat intelligible review. Holy shit  I don't know if that makes sense. Uhm, this is very potent and I am a new smoker. Over Thanksgiving break I stopped for a week and now my tolerance is back at day one. This feels a little bit psychedelic. Like, a baby drop of acid. Like, I feel ...‚Äù

‚ÄúA true Classic that still holds its ground! Smoked this the first time more than 15 years ago in Copenhagen and although it's a cult-classic up here in Scandinavia never stumbled across it again. Not even in Amsterdam.. Until now! 
It is even better than i remembered. A flawless Indica with Classic indica traits. . Whatever pains and bruises you have this will make you forget all about. I find it perfect after a hard...‚Äù

‚ÄúYou want to melt into your furniture and chill for awhile? Haven't slept in days and need to count those sheep? Fam, this strain is the bees fuckin knees. I ran out of my sleeping pills and the closest appointment is a month away. I can say with 100% CERTAINTY that this strain will be part of my nightly bowl so I can go to freakin sleep!‚Äù

‚ÄúI'm not normally an Indica fan. A friend of mine shared some of his NL with me during a sesh. I was unaware of what he had packed as we sit around matching bowls while shooting the breeze.
As soon as I hit this, I knew it was an amazing strain. It was like it shut all thought processes down, putting me into a very happy and relaxed state. A genuine stress melter.
I woke up this morning with a splitting headache, smok...‚Äù

‚ÄúI tried this strain recreationally in Amsterdam during our most recent visit. I am new to smoking, and had previously thought that sativa strains would be more for me, but following my previous visit to Amsterdam and my experience with Laughing Buddha, I decided to try my first indica strain.

I didn't realise how totally different this would be from the other strain I had tried, but I have to say that this was a muc...‚Äù

‚ÄúHad a very queezy stomach one night. Smoked a large bowl of Northern Lights, within ~45 minutes, complete relief. The effects of the high, wonderful! Everything is lightweight and very floaty. Completely don't give a fuck about anything. Great for anxiety and depression. Just FYI this is a VERY strong psychedelic strain. Not for the first time user, hits hard and keeps on a comin' like a freight train.‚Äù

‚ÄúCheery and glowy. Emphasis on sound - when everything else feels fuzzy, sound remains pristinely clear. A lot of heady high - but in the odd sense you FEEL it in your head, but it actually remains quite clear-minded. You feel legitimately happy. Physically, you're relaxed and at ease wherever. There's an enjoyable anticipation in your stomach. Very content and peaceful.

Another time, I smoked this on the beach at ...‚Äù

‚ÄúBeautiful strain. Very peaceful. 

I couldn't tell which way was north but I saw lights.‚Äù

‚ÄúNorthern Lights won me to Team Indica. I suffer from OCD, social/generalized anxiety, arthritis and muscle spasms in my back. Most hybrids and sativa's have made me paranoid as all hell. This might be my favorite strain so far. The overall effect was calm, relaxed, without racing thoughts, and a definite decrease in pain. I'm really new to Medical Marijuana and have only tried Blue Dream and Purple AK47 besides North...‚Äù

‚ÄúIt had been maybe ten years since I had come across some northern lights and I have no clue which one I smoked back then so I was happy to hear dr beammeup had nl #1  this weekend. I saw a lot of pictures online and was surprised how different this NL was.  In fact this was one of the most beautiful flowers I have ever seen. All the buds were small and crispy but dense but the color was memorizing. It was mostly all ...‚Äù

‚ÄúNorthern Lights Gotdam! I love this indica for a daytime indica buzz. I'm functionally HiGh. Not too much body but enough for relaxation. Can feel it slowly playing in my head. But no rollercoasters like sativas. Love this ShIt!‚Äù

‚ÄúNL is one of the most complex starins I've came across with. No wonder it's still the shit after half a century of existence. I've heard a whole variety of different descriptions, so I guess you really have to be picky with the genetics, mine were from sensi seeds. Now with the effects: it gets you high as hell everytime, no matter what's your tolerance level. People say its completely indica but mine had a great cer...‚Äù

‚ÄúGreat indica strain. Easy to grow resilient, fast flower time. Not that great of bag appeal..But the buzz is one of if not my favorite buzz of all time. You literally melt from head to toe. This strain is great for evening use and is the best strain I've tried for muscle pains. It's a legend‚Äù

‚ÄúThere is nothing like a well maintained and cured Northern Lights  bud to smoke.
From the look of the crystal covered buds, to the flavorful, unmistakable light, fruity flavor a well done Northern Lights is the pinnacle of what I would call, An old-timers top of the line smoke."

column3: ‚ÄúLove it, smoke in a comfortable position, you will be there for awhile. A full body high with a big head change.‚Äù

‚ÄúI'm writing this review will full awareness that it (as well as a vast majority of strains on Leafly) already has a stellar rating. But at the very least, I'll explain to you why this strain is hands down my favorite and why I think everyone should have it in their stash box...

‚ÄúDamn son, I am more faded than a store that only sells clothing from the 80's. Definitely would recommend to anyone who wants a nice, relaxing end of the day or night time smoke.‚Äù

‚ÄúI have bipolar disorder, and I must stay away from all sativa's.  Northern Lights has been the most perfect indica strain I have ever tried over the years.  It calms me, my mind does not race, and I feel serene.  I am able to go to bed with ease and stay asleep :) this is very heavy, so you will definitely want to be at home or somewhere you can relax.  If you suffer from anxiety, depression, mood swings, insomnia, a...‚Äù

Silly stoniness, Body melt Alert!..NL dulls my Chronic Pain & Arthritis inflamation...Smiles, Giggles, Touchy-Feely-Good. Deeep Sleeepüò¥üò™ ..Oh, yes, have Munchies and lots of liquid on hand! Thank you, LivWell on Pearl! üíú Stay High, JAH.....‚Äù

‚ÄúThis flower will couch you after 15 min. and melt your body. Good for relaxation and down time. This one is before bedtime, for a good rest. Also for a movie if you're not too tired yet. I found myself focused but still in a relaxing, thoughtful mood. Smells sweet and like cat piss. Taste a little more harsh than it smells with a sour/sweet undertone. Look light green with blonde/orange hairs. Very potent and sticky....‚Äù

‚ÄúI'm a 40 yo female with multiple sclerosis and hip pain from an auto accident so severe I lost 20 lbs, mobility, my career, etc. in 6 months time after 8 years of just dealing." Northern Lights allows me to sleep in absolute cradled comfort. Its mellow effects wrap heavy soothing arms of quiet bliss around your mind and body as you drift off into pain free precious sleep.‚Äù"

‚ÄúEASILY one of my favorite strain of all time. Northern Lights definitely takes it for me. I had just smoked Northern Lights, one at hiking uphill at beach which made the experience pleasant cause the day was so nice!! The Northern Lights had that very dense green color, heavy with the crystals around it (also made a hella keefs too). It truly is a beautiful sight to see. Very, very smooth taste too. It has that citri...‚Äù

‚ÄúMy favorite strain by far!

I live with Bipolar Disorder, High Anxiety and PTSD. Most strains I smoke can sometimes leave me being anxious and my head spinning. The high you get from this is perfect for anyone with extreme anxiety IMO. It leaves you with an intense body high and a very chilled out, happy mood. Very helpful with sleep as well.

Flavor wise, I get a slightly sweet berry note that's finished with a eart...‚Äù

‚ÄúA great Classic Strain, simply put. I be telling the truth, y'all. A well done crop of Northern Lights should register somewhere in the 22-26% THC zone, and that's plenty strong, for the psychoactive properties of this wondrous flower make it a mind bending experience when smoked. I really like the effects of this game changer" of the cannabis world. I'm an old timer

I'd caution new smokers not to smoke this strain during the day time as you may find it to have a very sedative effect. This is a strain you might want to smoke a couple hours or so before bed. ‚ÄúWhere most strains start with a bit overwhelming euphoria for me (a kind of lift-off feeling), Northern Lights starts with the body. You feel your muscles and joints relaxing first, the mind slowly follows the body into a very relaxed state. Not by knocking out or dragging, but by gently leading the mind like a romantic evening stroll. It's a content easiness. Like sitting on the porch after a long day, looking at th...‚Äù
‚ÄúLove Northern Lights. Best strain i've ever smoked. Makes me hella tired, and relaxed. 9.5 / 10‚Äù
‚ÄúFantastic morning smoke. Gets you up and going! Made me feel happy and like there was no care in the world. Spaced me out for sure.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis has become one of my favorites. One good hit and no matter what mood I'm in it instantly relaxes me and puts me in a better mood. I do tend to get the munchies from it but over all it's my go to in the evening to relax so that I can get a good nights sleep.‚Äù

‚ÄúWOW! That's all I thought when I tried this strain for the first time. I literally felt like I was melting into my bed and a complete wave of relaxation and a fit of giggles came my way. Great strain to sit back and watch some tv or play video games on. Wouldn't recommend if you have something important to do during the day because trust me you wouldn't want to go anywhere while under the influence of some wonderful ...‚Äù

‚ÄúI'm from Newark, NJ which doesn't have much in the way of variety of weed strains. I have had Grandaddy Purp, Blue Dream, Sour Diesel, and Gorilla Glue. All which give me a heavy head high which is disorienting and makes me tired. However Northern Lights had given me a mellow energy which I didn't feel too high to function".. I love it!‚Äù"

‚ÄúI grew one of these babies outdoors in coastal Western Australia from seed , but it was planted at the end of the Ozzie grow season, it grew about 3ft veg-growth then another foot of just dank strong ammonia & citrus smelling with bright orange hairs and a thick coverage of t.h.c. crystals! The high is really one that can pack a punch! An awesome indica and a personal favorite‚Äù
